Text: Synergen Cc Forwarded by Paul SmithENRONDEVELOPMENT on From Rod CT on CDT To Paul SmithENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Paul QuilkeyENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT David MinnsENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Debbie R CT Subject Synergen Debbie and I have agreed to set up Synergen Pty Limited for online EOL trading The terms under which this entity would require Synergen to post margin a Enrons discretion Rod

Re Real Options Cc Krishna Paul Q Raymond Y and I will call pm Houston time Thursday afternoon to discuss That is am Sydney time If that is not convenient I will call Krishna to arrange another time Regards Paul Stinson CT AM To Paul SmithENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Pinnamaneni CT Vince J CT Subject Re Real Options Paul Krishna and I are thinking that you may be able to book this type of option as a call swaption on power If you would like to discuss further lets set up a time when we can call you Stinson Forwarded by Stinson GibnerHOUECT on PM Vince J Kaminski AM To Paul SmithENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Stinson CT Vince J CT Paul QuilkeyENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Raymond YeowENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject Re Real Options Paul We have done a lot of work in this area I shall call you later today Monday my time Tuesday morning your time with some recommendations Vince PS Shirley please send a Real Options binder to Paul Vince From Paul NRONDEVELOPMENT on AM ZE To Vince J CT cc Paul QuilkeyENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Raymond YeowENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject Real Options Vince The Sydney office is currently evaluating a proposal that involves an option to participate in building a wind farm Should this proceed we would like to mark this option to market Have the Research group completed any work on methods for booking and remarking real options Alternatively do you have any suggestions as to the best way to value and book real options fairly Regards Paul Smith

Product Long Form Decsriptions Cc Here are the final Long Form Descriptions for the remaining regions NSW QLD SA The term of the Swaps that will initially be offered via EOL has yet to be decided but I assume we can set those in the Product Manager when we create Australian Power Products Rgds Paul

Australia completes first trade Cc Wed also like to thank everyone for their assistance in making the implementation of EOL in Australia smooth EOL has been well received locally with another trades being completed this morning Regards Paul Smith Forwarded by Paul SmithENRONDEVELOPMENT on David CT To Paul SmithENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Arfan CT David MinnsENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Elliott KatzENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Allan FordENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Mark CT Jay CT Debbie R CT Product Control Houston Product Control London EOL Call Center Dave CT Bob CT Rahil CT Mario Parra nron James CT Awais CT Marcello CT Tana CT Edmund CT cc Louise CT Subject Australia completes first trade As you may already know Australia completed their first EnronOnline transaction for Australian Power May Vic Peak on Monday at appox noon Australia time Id like to thank everyone who worked hard to ensure a successful and smooth launch of EnronOnline in Australia Dave
Hong Kong Weather GTCsPlease review as soon as is possible as we wish to list these products this Wednesday November in Hong Kong Regards Paul Smith

Hong Kong Weather Online Cc Hong Kong Weather products will be launched on EOL Tuesday th November in Hong Kong Current status is Legal GTCs are final and with David Minns Mark Taylor for signoff This signoff should be completed by am Thursday Houston time in order for the GTCs to be loaded by Tuesday Sydney time Long Form descriptions are undergoing last adjustments today DM and will be forwarded tonight for signoff Tax PWC has been asked for more specific advise on some issues DM HM following up These issues will not stop the launch Risk HK weather data is with RAC now for calculating sigmas AF has USD MTM weather book running Marketing No marketing has been undertaken yet and will not be prior to the launch partially pending PWC advice Technical DN has set the products up in test environment I will go through these tomorrow with Dale Credit We are not soliciting any new counterparties for the launch Data CW and JZ have completed data cleaning and analysis RY is pricing We will require signoff from Rudi Tom Mark Jeff to transfer the products to production and we would like to do this before this weeks out We want to have products loaded and priced in production Monday afternoon Sydney time If there are any other issues that I have missed or incorrectly stated please reply by Friday morning Sydney time to allow time to address them Regards Paul
Hong Kong Weather GTCsPlease review as soon as is possible as we wish to list these products this Wednesday November in Hong Kong Regards Paul Smith

Hong Kong Weather Online Cc Hong Kong Weather products will be launched on EOL Tuesday th November in Hong Kong Current status is Legal GTCs are final and with David Minns Mark Taylor for signoff This signoff should be completed by am Thursday Houston time in order for the GTCs to be loaded by Tuesday Sydney time Long Form descriptions are undergoing last adjustments today DM and will be forwarded tonight for signoff Tax PWC has been asked for more specific advise on some issues DM HM following up These issues will not stop the launch Risk HK weather data is with RAC now for calculating sigmas AF has USD MTM weather book running Marketing No marketing has been undertaken yet and will not be prior to the launch partially pending PWC advice Technical DN has set the products up in test environment I will go through these tomorrow with Dale Credit We are not soliciting any new counterparties for the launch Data CW and JZ have completed data cleaning and analysis RY is pricing We will require signoff from Rudi Tom Mark Jeff to transfer the products to production and we would like to do this before this weeks out We want to have products loaded and priced in production Monday afternoon Sydney time If there are any other issues that I have missed or incorrectly stated please reply by Friday morning Sydney time to allow time to address them Regards Paul
